frontmatter.title: Weaning
frontmatter.description: Industry experts state you have less than 72 hours to get pigs properly hydrated and consuming feed after weaning or their performance is seriously impacted.
frontmatter.subtitle: Industry experts state you have less than 72 hours to get pigs properly hydrated and consumingÂ feed after weaning or their performance is seriously impacted.

node.html: Tonisity PxW Tonisity PxW is a new product for 2020, that is designed to be delivered through water medicators and helps weaned pigs start fast in nurseries and wean to finish barns.
A transition program for weaned pigs as they arrive at a new facility.

frontmatter.mainTitle: Tonisity PxW How to Use Flyer

node.html: Find out how to improve water intake, feed intake and achieve heavier pigs with our PxW How to Use Flyer.
